items.title: Amazon will ship this 48- by 28-inch electric standing desk to your doorstep for $80 (Reg. $150)
items.summary:
Marsail 48- by 28-inch Electric Standing Desk

Buy for $80 (Reg. $150)

What we love

If your desk has seen better days or if you’re just starting to build out your office, this is a solid price point to cash in on for a standing desk. Generally speaking a 48-inch surface is a common width for an entry-level standing desk, but where this desk differs is in its depth, which spans 28 inches. That tacks on an addition 4 inches which can be helpful if you want to use a larger display and not be right up against it.
